html:
NEVIRA MINERALS LIMITED
PROCESSORS OF INDUSTRIAL MINERALS AND FILLERS,
TERRAZZO, AGRICULTURAL & ANIMAL FEED LIME
ORIENTAL GODOWNS, ATHI RIVER, KENYA
ADDRESS: P.O BOX 26647 – 00100 GPO
EMAIL: sales@neviraminerals.com | +254 793 562 441 / +254 700 113 116
TICKET DETAILS
Ticket number: {{ doc.ticket_number }}
From: NEVIRA MINERALS LIMITED
VEHICLE & DRIVER
Vehicle registration no: {{ doc.vehicle_registration_number }}
Driver name: {{ doc.driver_name }}
WEIGHT DETAILS
First weight (kg): {{ doc.first_weight }}
Second weight (kg): {{ doc.second_weight }}
Net weight (kg): {{ doc.final_weight }}
VERIFICATION
Date: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.weight_verification_date) }}
Time: {{ doc.weight_verification_time }}
{% if doc.item_type == 'Finished Goods' %}
CUSTOMER
{% for customer_item in doc.customer_item_description %} {% endfor %}
Customer Name Item Description Tonnage No. of Bags
{{ frappe.get_doc("Customer", customer_item.customer_name).customer_name }} {{ frappe.get_doc("Item", customer_item.item_description).item_name }} {{ customer_item.tonnage | float | round(3) }} {{ customer_item.bags }}
{% elif doc.item_type == 'Partner Production' %}
PARTNER INFORMATION
{% for partner_item in doc.partner_item_list %} {% endfor %}
Partner Name Item Description Tonnage
{{ partner_item.partner_description }} {{ partner_item.item_description }} {{ partner_item.quantity }}
{% else %}

No customer or partner information available for this transaction type.

{% endif %}
THIS IS A SYSTEM-GENERATED WEIGHBRIDGE TICKET.
THANK YOU FOR CHOOSING NEVIRA MINERALS.
name: Nevira Weighbridge Ticket
